Dressed in the latest fashion of conservative clothing, she

20612.name: {MPiatran{x, the {Rc{ml{Bothi{me{Rr{x~

20613.room_name: A man widdles away at a wooden block behind the counter, talking to a few people.
20613.name: {8E{wss{8i{cm{Cut{ch{x~

Dressed in a beautiful red colored gown and a towel slapped over
her shoulder, the waitress rushes around attempting to keep the place
clean.  Her elven features mixed with the scene of a common inn and
pub seems a bit odd, but she smiles contently as she goes about her
routine, making anyone forget for a moment the mystery which surrounds
her.
20614.room_name: A {yyoung {Wwaitress {xwalks about keeping all within the inn comfortably satisfied.
20614.name: the {Wwaitress{x~

description:
This old and weathered woman rocks gently in her chair, her ragdoll
hair swaying slowly with her movement.  Her tattered dress is riddled
with stiched up holes.  She smiles warmly at you and goes back to
knitting.
20615.room_name: An old lady rocks in her chair knitting a blanket.
20615.name: {8Ne{yl{gka{yu{8sh{x the {yW{ge{yav{ge{yr{x~

Casually dressed and not too concerned with his looks, a young man
briefly raises his head to look you over making sure you intend to buy

20616.name: the worker~

description:
{mA young lady with long slender legs and a slim waist presents

description:
Dressed with a common peasant shirt the barkeep quickly wipes his
brow as he clears the counter of dirty glasses.  He pockets the change
left for tips with a flick of his wrist as he shoots a quick grin and
continues on with his duties.
20619.room_name: The barkeeper polishes a shot glass.
20619.name: the barkeep~

description:
A fat and dirty man scratches at his scruffy beard as he watches
the dancers intently.
20620.room_name: A man sits at a back table, watching the dancers.
20620.name: the local~

description:
This middle-aged man looks to be quite comfortable with his drink
in hand.  He is engrossed in conversation with a couple other people
at the bar, and occasionally laughs loudly to make sure everyone knows
he's having a good time.
20621.room_name: A man sits at the bar drinking and socializing.
20621.name: a man~

description:
He is young, obviously oblivious to the world around him.  He
carries way too much equipment, burdening his journey, though it is
clear he has no clue where he is going.
20623.room_name: A young adventurer wanders the streets searching for excitement.
20623.name: a young adventurer~

description:
He is a typical, lower class citizen of Waterdeep, with simple
natural colored woven clothes and low quality leather accessories.  He
has a full beard, long and unkept, and hair which conceals his ears
and brow.  His face and hands are spotted in dirt and grime,
suggesting he hasn't bathed in many days.
20625.room_name: A city commoner strolls the city.
20625.name: a commoner~

20626.room_name: The {Rhigh official {xof Waterdeep stands here greeting folks.
20626.name: the {Rhigh official{x~

20627.room_name: A highly trained guard patrols the area, keeping the peace.
20627.name: an {wi{Dr{Wo{wnfist {xguard~

description:
This man is tall and large, not necessarily fat, but all around big
framed.  He wears a thick, ragged coat made of animal pelts, and a
wide rimmed hat commonly used to shade the sun.  A thick beard falls
to his chest, where patches of hair peek out from his collar.  A
strong musky odor lingers about him as he taps his thick, scaly
fingernails on the counter awaiting business.
20628.room_name: A burly and rugged looking man deals business behind a counter.
20628.name: a burly man~

20629.room_name: A beautiful elven women flutters her lashes at you from behind the counter.
20629.name: a thin elven woman~

description:
He's a massive looking guy.  He heaves large pieces of armor around
as if they were pelts.  The hammer he uses to repair armor plating is
as big as a grown human's head.  Don't pick a fight with him.
20630.room_name: A large forearmed armorer stands behind the counter repairing some armor.
20630.name: the armorer~

20631.room_name: A small halfling sharpens a knife at the back of the room.
20631.name: Riggly, the halfling~

20632.name: a stable worker~

description:
This medium draft horse is an all around average horse for work,
riding or battle.  Draft horses are preferred for pulling heavy loads,
as they tend to do better with them, and their lower cost justifies
the heavier burden imposed on them.
20633.room_name: {DA medium draft horse stands here alert.{x
20633.name: {Da medium draft horse{x~

description:
This warhorse is thick boned and muscular, a somewhat shorter breed
than riding horses, but renoun for their ability to stay their balance
in battle.
20634.room_name: {rA heavy warhorse stands majestic awaiting a command.{x
20634.name: {ra heavy warhorse{x~

description:
This young man with a bit of facial scruff stands here dressed in
blue slacks and a blue silk shirt.  He carries a few sheets of paper
in his hand with a bunch of scribbling on it, constantly referring to
it as he shouts out the important news of the day.
20636.room_name: The town crier stands tall, spouting out the recent news.
20636.name: the town crier~

description:
This guard's whitening hair and wrinkled skin suggests an aged
veteran of the watch, much older than the average city guard.  This
post is most likely a ceremonial one, assigned to aged and honored
soldiers of the city, rather than a post for fresh warriors.
20637.room_name: The {cgate {gguard{x of the city stands watch.
20637.name: the {cgate {gguard{x~

description:
The young man walks with his eyes lowered to the ground, and does
not even blink as he nears you.  His face is gaunt with fatigue and
pain, and his steps are short and uncertain, as if he has no real idea
where he intends to go.
20638.room_name: A dirty looking man shuffles along the dirt road.
20638.name: a young man~

description:
The fisherman seems to be trying to concentrate on the waters
before him but with all the noise and activity one's efforts seem
hopeless.  He fiddles with some bait and tackle glancing every once in
awhile at the waters where his line dangles in the salty waters.
20639.room_name: A fisherman sits by the dock waiting for a catch.
20639.name: a fisherman~

description:
The woman's white hair spills out from behind her ragged gray
shawl.  She locks her eyes on the ground before her, and seems to be
moving quicker ever since you laid eyes on her.
20640.room_name: A middle-aged woman shuffles by, pulling her shawl tight around her head.
20640.name: the middle-aged woman~

description:
This fine-looking young lady is rather scantily dressed, clad only
in a tight bodice and a short skirt.  She stands with one hand on her
side with her hip exaggerated to the left showing the fine curves of
her body seemingly all for you...?  As you look at her, she winks at
you, and beckons you closer.
20641.room_name: A lady of ill repute lounges against a building, eyeing you coyly.
20641.name: a lady of ill repute~

description:
She looks reasonably content with her life, but does to seem to be
in quite a hurry.  She seems friendly, though she eyes your armor and
weapon with concern.  She smiles at you when you approach, and nods
her head in greeting.
20642.room_name: A woman briskly walks down the road.
20642.name: a woman~

description:
The commoner seems content with his life.  He seems peaceful and
pleasant, though he eyes your weapon and armor with a concerned look. 
He smiles at you as you walk by, and nods his head in greeting.
20643.room_name: A citizen of waterdeep leisurely walks around.
20643.name: a citizen~

description:
This young child's knees are green and scraped from all the tree
climbing and running.  Still, he looks healthy and strong as if
nothing can stop him.
20644.room_name: A young boy climbs a tree trying to grab the high, thick branches.
20644.name: a young boy~

description: {DYou see only a slight variation in the patterns of the shadows.  {x
20645.name: {Da cunning thief{x~

20647.name: a noblewoman~

20648.name: {ya beggar{x~

20649.name: {yan alley cat{x~

anyone.
20651.room_name: A small {ybarn {mkitten{x looks at you with bright eyes.
20651.name: a {ybarn {mkitten{x~

description:
A young, rugged looked street kid is here looking quite confident
in himself.  He is casually standing around flipping a coin around his
fingers with amazing dexterity.  Although he is caught up in his own
coin trick, you have the feeling his eyes are watching every movement
around him as well.
20656.room_name: A little street halfling kid is here flipping a coin between his fingers.
20656.name: a sly halfling~

A small, young child he is.  Most likely homeless by seeing that

care of his appearance very much.
20657.room_name: {DA dirty street rat kid leans against a wall, looking at you cooly.{x
20657.name: {DA grubby street rat{x~

description:
The veteran's scarred and weathered face shows that he has seen
much in his travels - but perhaps not as good as he tells.  Although
he is past his adventuring days, he still looks like he could put his
share of a good fight.
20658.room_name: A veteran adventurer sits here, telling some tall tales of riches.
20658.name: a veteran adventurer~

description:
This gnome is obviously all talk.  She seems to be full of a
knowledge only known to the foolish of bards.  Her garb is a mixture
of dark browns and greens and her red bulbous nose seems to get
brighter as she talks more and more.  Perhaps she is forgetting to
breathe?
20659.room_name: A local gnome sits here gossiping.
20659.name: a local gossip~

description:
The nobleman seems very much at home in his surroundings.  His
clothes are all of the latest fashions and his manners impeccable.  He
offers you some coins if you'd be so good as to order a drink for him.
20660.room_name: A nobleman sits here, enjoying his class status.
20660.name: a nobleman~

description:
Her green eyes sparkle almost mischeviously as she peeks out from
underneath her small dark brown cloak; she catches your eye and winks,
giggling silently with a grin as if a plot is about to unfold...
20661.name: a {Mp{Ci{Gx{Ri{Ye{x~

description:
His deep black skin contrasts sharply with his white hair which
suggests strangely that this man must be drow - but welcomed in
Waterdeep?  He appears to be immeasurably old.  He strums on his
mandolin as you approach, and invites you to have a seat and listen.
20662.room_name: An old bard sits here playing on his mandolin.
20662.name: the old bard~

description:
The card shark is a greasy, scruffy man with ragged, patched
clothes.  Apparently the card business isn't doing too well here.  The
shark's eyes light up as you enter however, and he motions you over to
play a game.
20663.room_name: The card shark stands here, waiting for a sucker...er player.
20663.name: the card shark~

description:
She has been worn almost to the bone by the hard work of
maintaining a bar in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.  Heavy lines crease
her face, and her cheeks are deeply hollowed from a combination of
exhaustion and toothlessness.  She peers at you with dull brown eyes
as you look at her, and mumbles a request for your order.
20664.room_name: A worn down, toothless woman stands here tending the bar.
20664.name: the barkeep~

description:
The barkeep is a cheerful, middle-aged woman wearing a plain white
apron and a white lace cap.  Although the bustling nature of the
tavern, she somehow manages to look graceful as she pours numerous
drinks for people crowded around the bar.
20665.room_name: The barkeep strides behind the bar taking orders and cleaning as she moves.
20665.name: the barkeep~

20666.room_name: A waiter walks around the tavern serving numerous patrons.
20666.name: waiter~

description:
A cheerful, red-faced priest stands here, preparing some herbs for
some magical salve.  The priest is dressed in robes with the symbols
of the temple adorned on the hood.
20667.room_name: A priest stands here giving blessings.
20667.name: a priest~

description:
A cheerful priestess stands here, preparing some herbs for some
magical salve.  The priestess is dressed in robes with the symbols of

20668.name: a priestess~

description:
The owner bends over a stack of articles, organizing them for

The knight sits motionless with empty eyes gazing out of a white
wrinkled face.  However, you can still see strong muscles below the
tattered wool cloak he wears.  As he sees you, his gray papery mouth
opens, and his eyes widen in surprise.
20670.room_name: An old withered knight sits on a bench, lost in thought.
20670.name: an old knight~

20671.room_name: A well dressed innkeeper looks up at you expectantly.

description:
She is short, but in high fashion, wearing the latest styles of the
ladies of Waterdeep.  A pointed rimmed hat with several peacock
feathers tops her head.  A jewel encrusted satchel hangs to her side. 
Knee-high, pointed boots adorn her feet, while a lacy corset and
leather-tasselled skirt finish off the flamboyant effect.  She seems
kind, a little out of place, but even nobility and the occasional odd
character need to shop every now and then too.
20679.room_name: A woman dressed in flamboyant clothing wanders the marketplace.

description:
This mob prevents players from entering north into the bank. Players
must have a guild membership card for the Watchful Order of Magisters
and Protectorates before they are allowed to use the Waterdeep Bank system.

description:
This is a member of Waterdeep's city watch--the policing force of
the city.  This watch member wears the official uniform of the City
Watch: a doublet of leather armor studded with iron rings beneath a
green, black and gold overcoat that bears the city crest.  A
three-quarters helm prevents you from readily telling whether this is
a man or woman, but make no mistake, the watch is armed and is in
official capacity to use full force when necessary to uphold peace in
the city.
